reviews.review: Counter-Strike game which I have been playing for 16 years and also Global Offensive for 9 years just changed me spiritually and created statistics in my life, most of the time yes my nerves were ruined by this game, the factor that I was dying and could not play well affected my nerves, but today I play better and with a better temperament Looking forward to this game.

Hello everyone!
Started with cs 1.6. Experience in this game is great. The game itself is designed for team play, if we talk about the competitive mode. But the initial ranks of this concept do not exist if you play alone. Over time, when your rank grows, more and more understanding of what a team game is.
I wish everyone to have fewer cheaters in games (yes, this problem will last forever) and good team play.
And remember, it's just a game and don't waste your nerves.
Good luck guys!
